name: Pandora's Voyage
description:
"Welcome aboard the Pandora! This freighter will take you to the Mainland in only two weeks."

In this interactive story, you play the role of a tank who has boarded a ship to America. The ship is alive and so are you, because this is happening in the Hummelverse, the alternative Earth where AI-powered machines roam the world. 

You've saved up for many months to be able to afford the travel, and you're looking forward to starting a new life on the other continent. What you don't know yet is that you've actually signed up for the most horrifying journey you've ever taken. The ship is alive... but soon enough, you won't be.

This story is not finished yet. What you see here is a big WIP. Some things that are already written may change, more content will be added... eventually. Feel free to leave feedback for me to improve this!
